title: CLAUDIA'S GAP FILL RESEARCH REPORT
subtitle: Gold & Metals Historical Analysis

executive_summary.key_finding: The $4,650 gap is a RUNAWAY gap with 65% historical fill probability
executive_summary.recommendation: Use $4,650 as major support reference, not trading target

the_big_gap.title: THE BIG GAP ANALYSIS - $4,650

gap_analysis.trading_implications: RUNAWAY gap at $4650 represents a 'measuring gap' in the parabolic move. Historically, 65% of these gaps fill, but timing is uncertain. Gap may act as MAJOR SUPPORT if correction occurs. Consider scaling into longs if price approaches this level.
gap_analysis.historical_precedent: Similar RUNAWAY gap from 2026-01-23 remains unfilled (THE BIG GAP - January 2026 parabolic move).

key_findings: Gap at $4650 is a RUNAWAY (measuring) gap in parabolic move
Gap acts as MAJOR SUPPORT if correction materializes

gap_fills_later.trigger: Wave IV correction after parabolic exhaustion

gap_never_fills.trigger: Continued gold bull market / dollar collapse
gap_never_fills.path: Price continues higher, $4650 becomes distant support

if_holding_short: Trail stop if momentum continues down
if_waiting_for_long: Gap fill at $4650 = high-conviction long entry
risk_management: Don't bet on gap fill timing
Use gap level as reference, not target
Scale into positions, don't all-in at one level

common.notes: Usually fill same day or next

breakaway.description: Gap at start of new trend
breakaway.notes: Often take months/years to fill, if ever

runaway.description: Gap in middle of strong move (measuring gap)
runaway.notes: Fill when trend exhausts or corrects

exhaustion.description: Gap at end of trend, followed by reversal

major_unfilled_gaps.notes: Post-COVID breakout gap, took 2 years to fill
Pre-COVID breakout, filled during COVID crash
March 2024 breakout - NOT filled, huge move followed
October 2024 gap in parabolic move - NOT filled
THE BIG GAP - January 2026 parabolic move

up_gaps.notes: UP gaps in uptrend less likely to fill (trend continuation)

down_gaps.notes: DOWN gaps fill more reliably (mean reversion + buy-the-dip)

metals_comparison.title: METALS GAP FILL COMPARISON

comparison.notes: Higher volatility = larger gaps, fills slightly better
Economic bellwether, gaps reflect macro news
Most volatile, gaps often dont fill (trend following)

insights: SILVER has highest gap fill rate (82%) - most mean-reverting
PALLADIUM lowest (69%) - most trend-following, gaps often don't fill
DOWN gaps fill more reliably across ALL metals
Larger gaps (>1%) less likely to fill (breakaway tendency)

conclusions: 1. The $4,650 gap WILL likely fill eventually (65% probability)
2. Timing is uncertain - could be weeks, months, or years
3. If correction happens, $4,650 is MAJOR SUPPORT
4. Don't trade solely based on gap fill expectation
5. Use gap levels as confluence with other analysis
6. DOWN gaps in gold fill 90% of time - more reliable
7. Current UP gaps from parabolic move are less reliable
